title: Drawing, "Design for an Earring or", 1775–1800
medium:
Pen and black ink, wash, red watercolor, traces of black chalk
Support: cream laid paper
markings: Stamps: Verso: Museum for the Arts of Decoration Cooper Union
inscribed: Part of a watermark: a circle with a bird on top (?)

creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund

Drawing, "Design for an Earring or", 1775–1800.
